attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our country is in the need of a leader, a leader who is strong and determined and wont back down from anyone, one person who has done this is good old Margeret Thatcher, she wouln't give an inch to no one so I say Bring back Maggie Thatch!

Gordon Brown did his job as the chancellor but is not a PM.

Margeted Thatcher = The Way Forward

Your Country Needs You

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
